	<div id="block-block-4" class="clear-block block block-block ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><p><img src="http://www.brown.edu/web/images/philosophy-NewSeminar-room.jpg" /></p>
<p><strong>Department Chair</strong><br /><span><a href="mailto:paul_guyer@brown.edu" rel="nofollow">Paul Guyer</a></span><a href="mailto:bernard_reginster@brown.edu" rel="nofollow"></a></p>
<p><strong>Director of Graduate Studies</strong><br /><a href="mailto:christopher_hill@brown.edu" rel="nofollow">Christopher Hill</a></p>
<p><strong>Director of Undergraduate Studies</strong><br /><a href="mailto:justin_broackes@brown.edu" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Justin Broackes</a></p>
</div>
			
				
	</div>

						</div><!-- end .third-column -->
							
				</div><!-- end .marginator -->
			</div><!-- end #content -->


	

    </div><!-- End #wrapper -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S05 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13980]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=James+Dreier">James Dreier</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S06 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13981]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

</ul></li>

	<div id="block-block-4" class="clear-block block block-block ">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S07 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13982]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=David+Estlund">David Estlund</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

											<div id="sidebar-right" class="sidebar third-column column">
							
	
	<div id="block-block-4" class="clear-block block block-block ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><p><img src="http://www.brown.edu/web/images/philosophy-NewSeminar-room.jpg" /></p>

	</div>

    </div><!-- End #wrapper -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S08 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13983]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Mary+Louise+G+Gill">Mary Louise G Gill</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-6346</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-2719</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:philosophy_dept@brown.edu">philosophy_dept@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

											<div id="sidebar-right" class="sidebar third-column column">
							
	
	<div id="block-block-4" class="clear-block block block-block ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><p><img src="http://www.brown.edu/web/images/philosophy-NewSeminar-room.jpg" /></p>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S09 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13984]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Paul+D+Guyer">Paul D Guyer</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S10 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13985]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Richard+Heck">Richard Heck</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S11 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13986]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Christopher+S+Hill">Christopher S Hill</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

	<div id="block-views-contact_information-block_1" class="clear-block block block-views ">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S12 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13987]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Charles+Larmore">Charles Larmore</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S13 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13988]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Adam+R+Pautz">Adam R Pautz</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S14 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13989]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Bernard+M+Reginster">Bernard M Reginster</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Thesis</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1995 S15 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13990]</span></h3>


  	An elective for students writing a thesis. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Joshua+B+Schechter">Joshua B Schechter</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13991]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Felicia+N+Ackerman">Felicia N Ackerman</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

	</div>

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13992]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Christopher+S+Hill">Christopher S Hill</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

		<div class="content"><ul class="menu"><li class="leaf first menu-home"><a href="/academics/philosophy/home" title="Home">Home</a></li>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S03 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13993]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Mary+Louise+G+Gill">Mary Louise G Gill</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">
								
	
	<div id="block-menu-primary-links" class="clear-block block block-menu ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><ul class="menu"><li class="leaf first menu-home"><a href="/academics/philosophy/home" title="Home">Home</a></li>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S04 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13994]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Richard+Heck">Richard Heck</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">
								
	
	<div id="block-menu-primary-links" class="clear-block block block-menu ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><ul class="menu"><li class="leaf first menu-home"><a href="/academics/philosophy/home" title="Home">Home</a></li>
<li class="collapsed menu-about"><a href="/academics/philosophy/about" title="">About</a></li>
<li class="collapsed menu-people"><a href="/academics/philosophy/people" title="People">People</a></li>

</ul></li>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S05 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13995]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">
								
	
	<div id="block-menu-primary-links" class="clear-block block block-menu ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><ul class="menu"><li class="leaf first menu-home"><a href="/academics/philosophy/home" title="Home">Home</a></li>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S06 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13996]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Joshua+B+Schechter">Joshua B Schechter</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S07 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13997]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Bernard+M+Reginster">Bernard M Reginster</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S08 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13998]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Justin+Broackes">Justin Broackes</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S09 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13999]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=James+Dreier">James Dreier</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

			<section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/philosophy/sites/brown.edu.academics.philosophy/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:278px;">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S10 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 14000]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=David+P+Christensen">David P Christensen</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">
								
	
	<div id="block-menu-primary-links" class="clear-block block block-menu ">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S11 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 14001]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=David+Estlund">David Estlund</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">
								
	
	<div id="block-menu-primary-links" class="clear-block block block-menu ">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S12 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 14002]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Adam+R+Pautz">Adam R Pautz</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S13 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 14003]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Charles+Larmore">Charles Larmore</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S14 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 14004]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Nomy+Arpaly">Nomy Arpaly</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S15 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 14005]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Research in Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2980 S16 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 14006]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Paul+D+Guyer">Paul D Guyer</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Thesis Preparation</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2970 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15015]</span></h3>


  	For graduate students who have met the tuition requirement and are paying the registration fee to continue active enrollment while preparing for a preliminary examination.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>E: Grad Enrollment Fee/Dist Prep</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Thesis Preparation</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2990 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15016]</span></h3>


  	For graduate students who have met the tuition requirement and are paying the registration fee to continue active enrollment while preparing a thesis.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>E: Grad Enrollment Fee/Dist Prep</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Skepticism and Knowledge</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 0030 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15422]</span></h3>


  	What is knowledge?  What is the extent and basis of one's knowledge about physical objects, other people, oneself, the future, morality, and religion? WRIT
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>Writing - Designated Courses</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Felicia+N+Ackerman">Felicia N Ackerman</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">13:00 - 14:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>10</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

			<section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/philosophy/sites/brown.edu.academics.philosophy/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:278px;">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Ethics in the Novel</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1400 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15425]</span></h3>


  	Consideration of novels in terms of their treatment of such philosophical themes as death, courage, faith, betrayal, responsibility to others, and mercy. Focuses on themes in moral philosophy rather than themes in social and political philosophy. The course deals with contemporary American novels and also with Malory. No pre-requisites. WRIT
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>Writing - Designated Courses</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Felicia+N+Ackerman">Felicia N Ackerman</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">14:30 - 15:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>03</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

			<section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/philosophy/sites/brown.edu.academics.philosophy/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:278px;">
				<div class="banner-text">
					<a href="/academics/philosophy/" title="" style="height:278px;" class="bare-banner-link" accesskey="2"></a>				</div>
			</section>
			
		
<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Moral Theories</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1650 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15426]</span></h3>


  	A systematic examination of the main alternative normative moral theories: consequentialism; moral rights; moral duties; moral virtues. Focuses on the principal issues in the formulation of the different theories, on the main points of conflict between them, and on the critical evaluation of each. Readings are drawn mainly from contemporary work in moral philosophy.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Nomy+Arpaly">Nomy Arpaly</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">14:00 - 14:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>07</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

							<div id="breadcrumbs"><ul>	<li class="first"><a tabindex="181" href="/academics/philosophy/">Philosophy</a></li>	<li><a tabindex="182" href="/academics/philosophy/courses" title="Display Department Course Information">Courses</a></li>	<li class="last"><span class="a">Introduction to the Philosophy of Language</span></li></ul></div>					</nav>
				</div>
					

				</div><!-- end #brown-masthead -->
				
                          
			</header>


		
					
			<section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/philosophy/sites/brown.edu.academics.philosophy/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:278px;">
				<div class="banner-text">
					<a href="/academics/philosophy/" title="" style="height:278px;" class="bare-banner-link" accesskey="2"></a>				</div>
			</section>
			
		
<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Introduction to the Philosophy of Language</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 0850 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15432]</span></h3>


  	Discussion of the nature of linguistic meaning and other topics, such as vagueness; metaphor; and language, thought, and culture.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Anna+S+Bjurman+Pautz">Anna S Bjurman Pautz</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">11:00 - 11:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>16</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

																<ul id="topical-navigation">
					<li id="topical-about-brown" class="first"><a href="/about" tabindex="200">About Brown</a></li>

			</ul>

														<div id="tactical-navigation">
								<ul>
									<li id="tactical-atoz" class="first"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/a-to-z" tabindex="2" accesskey="3">A to Z Index</a></li>
									<li id="tactical-people" class="last"><a href="http://directory.brown.edu" tabindex="3">People Directory</a></li>
								</ul>
							</div>
							
							<div id="breadcrumbs"><ul>	<li class="first"><a tabindex="181" href="/academics/philosophy/">Philosophy</a></li>	<li><a tabindex="182" href="/academics/philosophy/courses" title="Display Department Course Information">Courses</a></li>	<li class="last"><span class="a">Graduate Proseminar</span></li></ul></div>					</nav>
				</div>
					

				</div><!-- end #brown-masthead -->
				
                          
			</header>


		
					
			<section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/philosophy/sites/brown.edu.academics.philosophy/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:278px;">
				<div class="banner-text">
					<a href="/academics/philosophy/" title="" style="height:278px;" class="bare-banner-link" accesskey="2"></a>				</div>
			</section>
			
		
<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Graduate Proseminar</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2200 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15436]</span></h3>


  	Will cover classics of philosophy from the end of the 19th century to the end of the 20th; including ethics as well as metaphysics, epistemology and philosophy of language.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Justin+Broackes">Justin Broackes</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">09:00 - 10:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>08</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Ancient Philosophy</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 0350 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15454]</span></h3>


  	This course will introduce students to the major concerns of Greek philosophy, and how they are addressed by the Presocratics, Plato, Aristotle, and the Stoics. We will have two related ends: historical and critical. On the one hand, we will get clear so far as we are able what it is that these thinkers thought; on the other, it is important to evaluate their arguments. This course will emphasize the identification of the problems and the solutions to them that seemed pressing to these thinkers, especially if such problems seem alien to us. WRIT
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>Writing - Designated Courses</dd>
			
		


																	
	<dt>Instructor</dt>

		<dd>

			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>

		<div class="wrapper">
		
			<header id="header-region">
				<section id="audience-gateways">
					<div class="marginator">
						<h6>Information For:</h6> 
						<ul>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Logic</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 0540 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15455]</span></h3>


  	An introduction to perhaps the most fundamental tool of rational thought: deductive logic. Course begins with basic sentential logic, then moves on to deduction, quantification, and predication. Argumentation and reasoning may also be addressed at times. No previous experience with logic or philosophy is required.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


																	
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Richard+Heck">Richard Heck</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
											
	<dt>Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Rachel+L+Leadon">Rachel L Leadon</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
											
	<dt>Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Laurence+A+Kenny">Laurence A Kenny</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
											
	<dt>Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Mark+Christman">Mark Christman</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
									
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Smith-Buonanno Hall">Smith-Buonanno Hall</a> 106</div>
						<div class="times">10:00 - 10:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Sep 17, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=S. Frank Hall for Life Science">S. Frank Hall for Life Science</a> MARC</div>

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Perception</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 0990F S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15456]</span></h3>


  	Begins with a reading of some classic works, and then moves on to contemporary work. Topics include: naive realist versus representational theories of sensory experience, the possibility that sensory experience is massively illusory (so that we already occupy a kind of “virtual reality”), the role of the brain in shaping sensory experience, and the alleged foundational role of sensory experience in knowledge. The focus will be on vision but we will also discuss other sense-modalities
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>17</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Adam+R+Pautz">Adam R Pautz</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">15:00 - 17:30 Mon - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>15</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Dissertation Workshop</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2800 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15457]</span></h3>


  	No description available.  Course for graduate students during their 4th year or above.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Joshua+B+Schechter">Joshua B Schechter</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">09:00 - 09:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>01</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

				<div id="content">

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Epistemology</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1750 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15510]</span></h3>


  	We’ll concentrate on several issues involving knowledge and rational belief:  What is knowledge, and how does it relate to rational or justified belief?  Does a person’s knowing something depend on non-evidential factors such as the practical importance of the person’s being correct?  Does the justification of a person’s belief depend just on facts internal to the person—or might it depend on her environment?  And what can we learn from thinking about the skeptical position which claims that we’re not justified in believing even the most ordinary things about the world around us? WRIT
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>Writing - Designated Courses</dd>
			
		


																	
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=David+P+Christensen">David P Christensen</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
											
	<dt>Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Chad+T+Marxen">Chad T Marxen</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
									
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">14:30 - 15:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>03</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Philosophy of Science</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 1590 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15511]</span></h3>


  	Some very general, basic questions concerning science.  Can evidence justify belief in theories which go beyond the evidence?  What is the nature of good scientific reasoning?  Is there a single scientific method? What is a scientific explanation?  Does science reveal truths about unobservable reality, or merely tell us about parts of the world we can measure directly? WRIT
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>Writing - Designated Courses</dd>

	</dd>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Scepticism, Ancient and Modern: Sextus, Descartes, Hume</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 0991L S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15620]</span></h3>


  	Ancient Sceptics had a great series of arguments for undermining claims to knowledge and (some say) belief. (Honey tastes sweet to some, but bitter to people with a fever. 'Since everything is relative, we shall suspend judgement as to how things are independently'. And many more.) But, some say, it was only with Descartes that philosophers put in question the very existence of an independent world. We shall explore what kind of life the life of a sceptic may be; what kinds of fragmentation of the world may (or may not) result; and some differences between older and newer forms of scepticism.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>20</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Justin+Broackes">Justin Broackes</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">15:00 - 16:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>03</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Color and its Place in Nature</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2020P S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15622]</span></h3>


  	Focuses on the nature and status of color, an instance of the ancient puzzle of appearance vs. reality. We will begin by examining contemporary realist views of color (Armstrong, Byrne and Hilbert, Tye). Then we will take a look at irrealist approaches (Chalmers, Pautz). Finally we will look at “relativist views” (Jonathan Cohen, Jack Spencer). Although the focus will be on color, we will also sometimes discuss other sensible properties (audible qualities, olfactory qualities, etc.)
					<h6>Section specific notes:</h6>
			<div class="section-text">This course is held on MIT's campus in Boston, MA.  Building 32, room D831.</div>
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>40</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Adam+R+Pautz">Adam R Pautz</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">14:00 - 17:00 Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>03</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Moral Psychology</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2030A S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15844]</span></h3>


  	This seminar will examine in depth some problems associated with morality, rationality, and the human psyche. Possible topics: acting for reasons, moral responsibility,  practical reasoning, moral character, love, modesty, being too good, moral luck, desire, weakness of will. Undergraduates require instructor permission to enroll.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>17</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Nomy+Arpaly">Nomy Arpaly</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">15:00 - 17:30 Wed - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>17</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Plato's Theaetetus</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 2150I S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15846]</span></h3>


  	In this seminar, we will discuss Plato's Theaetetus, his investigation of knowledge, and associated topics, including relativism, perception, true and false judgment, and accounts, with a view to understanding how Plato distinguishes knowledge from true belief. Open to graduate students only; others may enroll with instructor permission.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>12</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Mary+Louise+G+Gill">Mary Louise G Gill</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">18:40 - 21:10 Tue - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>05</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Paradox and Infinity</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 0990T S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 16400]</span></h3>


  	This course will focus on several important paradoxes that arise within philosophy and mathematics. We will use these paradoxes to investigate central issues in metaphysics, the philosophy of language, decision theory, physics, mathematics, and logic. Among the paradoxes we will discuss are Zeno's paradoxes of space, time, and motion; the paradoxes of set theory; the paradoxes of truth and reference; the sorites paradox; and paradoxes of rational action and rational belief. Enrollment limited to 20.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>20</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Joshua+B+Schechter">Joshua B Schechter</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">16:00 - 18:30 Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>04</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Aesthetics: Art and Morality</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>PHIL 0050 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 16546]</span></h3>


  	From Plato to the present, the power of the arts to trigger powerful emotions has been seen by some thinkers as a threat to morality, by others as a vital support.  This debate raises such issues as whether aesthetic experience is a distinctive kind of experience and whether the creation and reception of art are autonomous activities free from the constraints of morality and politics.  Beyond Plato, authors to be read will include such figures as Hume, Mendelssohn, Rousseau, Kant, Schiller, Hegel, Schopenhauer, Ruskin, Tolstoy, Collingwood, Stanley Cavell, Martha Nussbaum, Alexander Nehamas, and others.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Paul+D+Guyer">Paul D Guyer</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">13:00 - 14:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>10</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>
